title: Montfort: The Early Years -  1229 to 1243
description: He was deeply religious and the greatest warrior of his time but...He married a nun who was the King of England's sister.Was he the Queen's lover and father of the heir to the throne?The king wanted him dead at any cost.He conquered England and founded ParliamentFor seven hundred years it was a hanging crime to speak his name.
author: Katherine Ashe
